lead_paragraph: A man accused of videotaping the ill wife of Senator Thad Cochran during a heated election campaign pleaded guilty Monday to conspiracy.

headline.main: Mississippi: Plea Deal Is Reached Over Unlawful Images of Senator’s Wife
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Plea Deal Is Reached Over Unlawful Images of Senator’s Wife

snippet: A man accused of videotaping the ill wife of Senator Thad Cochran during a heated election campaign pleaded guilty Monday to conspiracy.
